author: Vatsala Gaur
title: UP ramping up quarantine facilities for returnees
description: UP ramping up quarantine facilities for returneesThe Uttar Pradesh government began ramping up makeshift quarantine facilities for hundreds of thousands of migrant labourers who have crossed the state's borders till Sunday, in line with a central government d…
content: Lucknow: The Uttar Pradesh government began ramping up makeshift quarantine facilities for hundreds of thousands of migrant labourers who have crossed the state's borders till Sunday, in line with a central government directive on the issue. The challenge, ho… [+3095 chars]
